entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI - Traffic Safety 2002. Transportation habits of drivers in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Dávid, Kriszta
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F68: TÁRKI - Traffic Safety 2002. Transportation habits of drivers in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Gábor, Miklós
entry.dcterms:description: the survey is part of an international comparative research, examining the transportation habits of car drivers regularly participating in road traffic and their opinions about traffic regulations
entry.dcterms:subject: transport, travel (and mobility)
social behaviour and attitudes
law, crime and legal systems
person
survey data
cross-section
Non-representative two-stage stratified random sample. Persons with B type driving licenses were asked who had been driving in the previous 12 months.
face-to-face interview
D
